meanings.definition: A pair of protective eyeglasses with side shields.
meanings.sent1: I wear goggles when I swim to protect my eyes from water.
meanings.sent2: The scientist put on her goggles before conducting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The dog tried to wear goggles to look cool, but they kept falling off.
meanings.sent4: Her goggles of determination helped her see through the challenges ahead.
meanings.sent5: The skier's goggles shielded her eyes from the blinding snow.

meanings.definition: To look with wide-open eyes, typically in amazement or wonder.
meanings.sent1: The children goggles at the magician's tricks during the show.
meanings.sent2: She goggles at the beautiful sunset over the horizon.
meanings.sent3: The cat goggles at the birds outside the window, dreaming of catching one.
meanings.sent4: His eyes goggles in disbelief as he witnessed the incredible magic trick.
meanings.sent5: The audience goggles in awe as the acrobat performs daring stunts.
